# hasSubmenu

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the menu item has a submenu.

## Declaration

```swift
var hasSubmenu: Bool { get }
```

## Managing submenus

- **submenu**: The submenu of the menu item.
- **parent**: The menu item whose submenu contains the receiver.

items.description: The submenu of the menu item.
items.name: submenu

items.description: The menu item whose submenu contains the receiver.
